WRITING.TITLE: What about adding something like this. Maybe give it low durability and low maximum speed.

WRITING.TEXT: To make it less OP
High speed/low power when in wheel mode, and low speed/high power in track mode. This can make a light build have the switch between the power of a hardened track and the movement of tires
Make a big gas tank and sell the excess gas

That #8217;s embarrassing #128532;

I thought I heard about a legendary weapon #8217;s damage correlate with the power score. It may have only been the harvester because people were sticking it on the beginner cabin and keeping the power score below 2000.
It would actually have the same HP either way, it #8217;s just the power and speed that are different

I did see the article and harvester damage is actually correlated with the total powerscore of the vehicle, but only the harvester. And you #8217;re right about currency. Renting benches makes the earning money a lot worse.

WRITING.TITLE: Every weapon and cabin change in the new update
WRITING.TEXT: Corvo: increased accuracy and range Arbiter: maximum bonus damage from the perk will be gained faster Reaper: increased durability Hammerfall: shotgun will only have one rotation-stopping charge, but to accumulate it it will be enough to drive only 100 m Pulsar: increased reload time Ghost cabin: power increased by 10%, tonnage increased to 6000, max weight increased 12000 Howl: the perk now charges when an enemy is within 30m of the cabin (previously 20), maximum damage increase lowered to 20% (previously 25%) NEW FEATURES TO BE RELEASED SOON Scorpion: will not deal 100% damage to penetrable parts Hovers: will dampen movement inertia faster along with rework on movement on inclines
The perk is still bad, but if you #8217;re looking for a car with decent power and tonnage, it #8217;s above average

WRITING.TITLE: Opinions about the new update?
WRITING.TEXT: The new update has come to PC, but not to console. So far I #8217;ve heard mixed reviews from everyone I #8217;ve talked to. Is there Anything us console players should prepare for? Any opinions on the new update.

I had all three modern warfares on my ps3 and they might be my favorite multiplayer game of all time. It #8217;s frustrating to watch activision remake classic games like instead of using it as a outline for newer games. Black ops 2 and any other game before that are almost perfect. Even the much older ones like big red one and COD 3.

Epic part prices are messed up though. The items you can #8217;t craft can go up to 2000. But now with the new crafting system in place, it #8217;s much easier to obtain rare parts and gain cash quickly.
A sandbox mode would be great. I #8217;ve always wanted to test a weapon with my own build. Maybe have a special bedlam for these cars

Instead of playing for common parts, you get a lot more scrap per battle and build common parts yourself. It ranges between 20-75 scrap for a part and you earn between 20-30 scrap per battle. I actually like this system better than the old one because you don #8217;t have to play 5 times to get one piece you need.
It #8217;s very efficient. I #8217;ve gotten 3 epic parts since the update, and I don #8217;t even grind a lot
Why is there a tier one tank on the battlefield in the first place
I #8217;d say make the weapons all piercers and add a some type of cooling module OR remove the buzzsaw and use 2 more junkbows.
A better question is when it would be coming to Mac

I was playing a 3v3(or one of those modes) on modern warfare 3. I almost dropped my remote, but caught it in midair. I accidentally set a claymore where I was standing. It was in such a perfect spot because you couldn #8217;t even see the laser designators on the front. An enemy walked in front of it and got killed. For anyone who hasn #8217;t played MW3, when you kill an enemy they get about 3 seconds to say something to you through their mic. He cussed me out, called me a pussy (the normal stuff) and threatened me. Now I wasn #8217;t planning to lay another one down the next match, but He was being an asshole about it and I set one in the exact spot. The same guy got killed but I didn #8217;t hear anything because he left before he got to say something else.
Battle front 1 and 2 (the original)
How much will this cost exactly? Cause it might be worth it

I #8217;d say the torero cabin is the best overall. I plan to get the favorite cabin or build the werewolf (cause it #8217;s cheaper). The steppe spider is actually pretty good for cannons, even without the legs because it has pretty high tonnage and still has 12 points.

1958 Baltimore Colts vs giants
I #8217;d recommend APC wheels or shivs. Both are harder to shoot off, shivs are great for speed, APC for heavy builds

A cheetah engine and a chameleon can be the key to a very good fast build. If you have to buy anything, get a cheetah. Or at least get a dun horse, it can get you more mass and quicker speeds if you want to stay at a lower PS.
Judges and little boys are good if you want it cheap. 88mms are good if you have the resources to build them

WRITING.TITLE: Just got grinders, now I #8217;m looking for other parts
WRITING.TEXT: So, I just got meat grinders(which are now my favorite parts in my inventory) and I almost have enough for 2 crickets. I #8217;m thinking about building a werewolf cabin. Should I continue pursuing the werewolf, or craft and sell to get torero. Or should I just abandon the plan entirely and get something else.
Thank you for reminding me
Silly bands, I don #8217;t know about everyone else but they were big at my elementary school
I #8217;d say sell the scavenger cabin and get a jawbreaker(steppenwolf). You get one more energy point, but just a little less mass limit. The wyvern is good too.
I just read the market and craft/sell the highest craftable rare item. The scavenger rare engine usually goes pretty high on the ps4 market.
Very good for wasps, crickets and artillery
Markets are very weird on ps4, most rare items sell for 80 and most epics sell for 700. The scavenger engine can be sold for about 90
Steppe spider

My experience playing against hovers (I #8217;m at 5.5k ps) is that they #8217;re too sensitive. Its really easy to mow one down with an impulse. Once I knock off one hover it #8217;s much harder for them to aim at me. Sometimes I can render a hover build useless with just 2 boom sticks. They can be effective, but as soon as I catch them off guard it doesn #8217;t take me long to destroy them.
If you do,you #8217;re gonna have to add a skinner, Kapkan , or (if you #8217;re old enough) you can use a chameleon and try to get around the enemy

Weapons that can heat up parts are great. It #8217;s also good support for allies. A wedge build and a chameleon can flip a car and make them useless. A wedge is a good counter for Goliath track builds.
You should be able to look at the market and see the sell prices. It #8217;s easier if you arrange it based on rarity and sell price.
I wish we could build stable motorcycles without hovers

The first thing you need to do is get all the blue parts you need. Create the blue types of weapons you want to use. Also, Before you move to purple, I #8217;d recommend a chameleon, ammo crate, a cooler or radiator, An engine and the t-51 optics. You may not need them now, but you can do a lot more with them in you #8217;re inventory. After that, you can just grind out scrap metal and go for what you want. You can get the purple a lot quicker if you ONLY focus on creating the necessary blue parts. TLDR:create blue parts that you need for your play style, then grind for scrap and create a purple
I #8217;d love to see a small CIWS system.
If you use automatic weapons, aim for the wheels. If you use cannons aim for the top of the car.

WRITING.TITLE: New gun drone to be released

WRITING.TEXT: I #8217;ve got a melee/synthesis build. I mostly do raids with my clan and they like to snipe enemy #8217;s at a distance with other energy weapons. I snipe with my 2 synthesis and melee any enemy that comes too close to our position. Everyone in my clan uses really heavy builds (and I don #8217;t have as many weapons as they do) so I just protect our position with my smaller, faster car.
Ace combat isn #8217;t bad tho
Borer. More durability and more surface area to the damage output
Playing on console is fun cause nobody ever uses text chat. And don #8217;t you earn the same amount of scrap if you lose anyway?
I do have good games where we lose and I #8217;ll still get 25
It #8217;s definitely performance based. I think it #8217;s more about damage than actual kills cause one time I got 8 assists and won MVP by a lot of points.
Adding fuel barrels and generators [have been proven](https://youtu.be/xs099dL8NbU) to boost self-destruct damage. The problem is the enemy can make those parts explode and really hurt your vehicle.
Mostly for live sports

WRITING.TITLE: New pack to be released
WRITING.TEXT: A new pack called #8220;born free #8221; is to be released soon. The pack features a Steven cabin, Golden eagle engine, several stickers, new paint, and new epic auto cannon called the #8220;joule #8221;. In all honesty, I think they #8217;re just making cars to make cars. The new weapons are just different designs of older weapons.
